thread.title: Reinstate Wayne Shaw to Sutton FC
thread.title_full: Reinstate Wayne Shaw to Sutton FC

title: Reinstate Wayne Shaw to Sutton FC
text:
by: Claire Clarke target: The Chairman of Sutton FC 
Wayne shaw was dedicated to Sutton FC and even stayed there 3 times a week to fulfill his commitments ... He has resigned amid the circus of the fa cup , in which he was seen eating a pie live in tv , the scandal comes in because his friends had bets on this happening . Wayne was on GMB this morning and the gaming commision launched an investigation because of this admission, leading to the resignination. ... Pc gone mad It was an innocent bit of fun !!* reinstate this man at once. .. This is absolutely disgusting read petition letter â–¾
